ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This study was developed by the group of researchers from the Molecular Virology Laboratory of the Fundação Oswaldo Cruz, Rondônia, which together with the Research Center in Tropical Medicine of Rondônia—CEPEM/RO and the Federal University of Rondônia has contributed to scientific development in the Amazon region. The Institute of Molecular Biology of Paraná—IBMP and the Laboratory of Ecology of Transmissible Diseases in the Amazon of the Leônidas & Maria Deane Institute (ILMD/Fiocruz Amazônia) were important collaborators for the development of the research in addition to the Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel—CAPES and the Foundation for the Development of Scientific and Technological Actions and the Research of the State of Rondônia—FAPERO, for which some authors received financial aid (grants) during the process.
